localised_description: A Steam Tank is a monstrous, smoke-belching war machine.
Often the most dangerous assault comes from the enemy you least expect.
This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.
The Realms of Man must not fall. Our fate is intertwined with theirs, and if they fall, so too do we.
Of all the 'younger races', the ultra-secretive Lizardmen respect the Asur the most - enough to grant access to certain high-caste individuals.
